title: Muting
body: Is there any way I can be muted by my team in ranked only, as a preventative measure against raging?

replies.body:
Just don't use chat, lower elo players focus on a tiny little chat box too much over the game if you have a problem with an ally just drag the chat box off the screen or mute them.

With the new pings it is possible to not use chat and still win easily.

its called self control.

if you find that you cant help it, just mash buttons whilst saying out loud what you want.

Like say to yourself "god damn, dumb fucking feeder" but type "kjsnbfdijnbfgiudsngfiunerfiunewuionewiu"
